data.title: Smoke and Blue in the Face
data.meta_description: New York: Hyperion, 1995. ADVANCE UNCORRECTED PROOF, preceding the First Edition. Basis for the 1995 film Smoke, written and co-directed by Paul Auster, and for the 1995 sequel Blue in the Face, also written and co-directed by Auster. About Fine in perfect-bound wrappers. Book #157144
data.text:
Paul Auster

New York: Hyperion, 1995. ADVANCE UNCORRECTED PROOF, preceding the First Edition.

Basis for the 1995 film "Smoke," written and co-directed by Paul Auster, and for the 1995 sequel "Blue in the Face," also written and co-directed by Auster.

About Fine in perfect-bound wrappers.

[Book #157144]
